properties.entry: update sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry set IS_USED = '1' WHERE SUPPLIER_ID = '{@#supplierId#}' and SKU = '{@#sku#}' and plan_id = '{@#planId#}'

SELECT spsi.* , ss.NAME, ss.ID AS SUP_ID FROM sc_supplier ss, sc_real_product_supplier srps LEFT JOIN sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry spsi ON srps.REAL_SKU = spsi.SKU AND srps.SUPPLIER_ID = spsi.SUPPLIER_ID AND spsi.PLAN_ID = '{@#planId#}' WHERE srps.REAL_SKU = '{@#sku#}' AND ss.ID = srps.SUPPLIER_ID {@ and srps.supplier_id = '#supplierId#'}

INSERT INTO sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry ( ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SKU, ASIN, PLAN_ID, CYCLE, PACKAGE, PAYMENT, NUMBER_OFFER, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, MEMO, URL, IMAGE, PRODUCT_SIZE, PACKAGE_SIZE, PACKINGS_PECIFICATIONS ) VALUES ( '{@#id#}', '{@#supplierId#}', '{@#sku#}', '{@#asin#}', '{@#planId#}', '{@#cycle#}', '{@#package#}', '{@#payment#}', '{@#numberOffer#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#status#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#url#}', '{@#image#}', '{@#productSize#}', '{@#packageSize#}', '{@#packingSpecifications#}' )

SELECT t.*, ROUND((t.PER1_PRICE + t.PER1_SHIP_FEE),2) AS COST1, ROUND((t.PER2_PRICE + t.PER2_SHIP_FEE),2) AS COST2, ROUND((t.PER3_PRICE + t.PER3_SHIP_FEE),2) AS COST3 FROM ( SELECT spsi.* , IFNULL(spsi.OFFER1/spsi.NUM1,0) AS PER1_PRICE, 0 AS PER1_SHIP_FEE, IFNULL(spsi.OFFER2/spsi.NUM2,0) AS PER2_PRICE, 0 AS PER2_SHIP_FEE, IFNULL(spsi.OFFER3/spsi.NUM3,0) AS PER3_PRICE, 0 AS PER3_SHIP_FEE FROM sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry spsi WHERE spsi.asin = '{@#asin#}' ) t

SELECT t.*, ROUND((t.PER1_PRICE + t.PER1_SHIP_FEE),2) AS COST1, ROUND((t.PER2_PRICE + t.PER2_SHIP_FEE),2) AS COST2, ROUND((t.PER3_PRICE + t.PER3_SHIP_FEE),2) AS COST3 FROM ( SELECT spsi.* , IFNULL(spsi.OFFER1/spsi.NUM1,0) AS PER1_PRICE, 0 AS PER1_SHIP_FEE, IFNULL(spsi.OFFER2/spsi.NUM2,0) AS PER2_PRICE, 0 AS PER2_SHIP_FEE, IFNULL(spsi.OFFER3/spsi.NUM3,0) AS PER3_PRICE, 0 AS PER3_SHIP_FEE FROM sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry spsi WHERE ( spsi.SKU IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT srp.REAL_SKU FROM sc_real_product srp WHERE srp.REAL_SKU = spsi.sku AND srp.ID = '{@#realId#}' ) ) OR ( spsi.ASIN IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sc_real_product srp, sc_real_product_rel srpr, sc_amazon_account_product saap WHERE srp.ID = srpr.REAL_ID AND srpr.SKU = saap.SKU AND srpr.ACCOUNT_ID = saap.ACCOUNT_ID AND saap.ASIN = spsi.ASIN AND srp.ID = '{@#realId#}' ) ) AND DATE_SUB( CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH ) <= spsi.create_time ) t
